meanings.sent1: She fictionized her own adventures for the storybook.
meanings.sent2: The author fictionized the historical event to create an exciting novel.
meanings.sent3: He fictionized his daily routine by adding magical creatures.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination fictionized the mundane world into a fantastical realm.
meanings.sent5: The artist fictionized reality with vibrant colors and whimsical characters.

meanings.sent1: The documentary fictionized the life of the famous explorer.
meanings.sent2: She fictionized her childhood memories in her latest book.
meanings.sent3: The comedian fictionized his embarrassing moments for comedic effect.
meanings.sent4: His speech fictionized the challenges he faced as heroic adventures.
meanings.sent5: The movie fictionized the true story to make it more entertaining.

meanings.sent1: The writer fictionized the ancient legend to appeal to modern readers.
meanings.sent2: They fictionized the historical figure's love life in the play.
meanings.sent3: The children fictionized their school day as a thrilling mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams fictionized her fears into fantastical monsters.
